post.text: The man who could be your next president may be deeply indebted to another country. Do you trust him to run ours?

comment.author: Michelle
comment.text: Where are Hillary's emails? Nothing Trump has done is as bad as Hillary. She cannot even be trusted with classified information. "She is extremely careless with classified information" - FBI. A president has to handle classified information. She won't be able to get a security clearance so she is unqualifed!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.author: Keith
replies.text: Not as bad? He refused to pay people for work done, defrauded people of money thru trump university, has used his foundation money for himself. In summary he is a thief. Worried about emails? That case is closed. Are u really that stupid?

replies.author: Blake
replies.text: Keith did anyone die under his watch the way the guys died in libya under hers? and this was AFTER they begged for more security. this witch is toast. her polls are dropping faster than bills trousers

replies.author: Michelle
replies.text: Keith Hillary has dooped you really good. She is corrupt! The Democratic Party is corrupt! All the things you mentioned do not involve National Security and pay for play with other governments like Hillary did. A lot of the things you mentioned are twisted lies perpetuated by Hillary. Call me stupid or diplorable like Hillary does, I don't care. You are gullable for not seeing Hillary for what she really is!

replies.author: Amy
replies.text: So Michelle , you think Hillary is terrible because she had a private email server. What about Trump who is currently being sued for repeatedly raping a girl, age 13, in 1994. Did you know Trump raped his ex-wife, Ivanna. Do you think Trump isn't as bad as Hillary?
